retweet.text:
xAI just quietly released a SOTA model that‚Äôs insanely powerful

Dominates the LM Arena Text leaderboard, securing both #1 and #2 spots - the highest scores ever

Hallucination rates are reduced by nearly 70% compared to the previous version, setting a new standard for reliability

Grok 4.1 now finds images, includes them in responses, and can search and play YouTube videos right in the chat

Ranks at the top on the Emotional Intelligence Benchmark - understands human emotions much better and offers real emotional insights

Preferred in 64.8% of head-to-head comparisons over the previous model

Overall, Grok 4.1 is a massive upgrade - making it an easy choice as your new go-to AI assistant

tweets.text: RT @Yuhu_ai_: Grok4.1 thinking and non thinking sitting at #1 and #2, 31 elo scores above others.
